projects.title: Gamering
projects.subtitle: E-Commerce Web Application
projects.short_description: Web application where you can query for computer components, add them to your cart, authenticate and 'purchase' your products.

projects.title: Gamering Administrator Tool
projects.subtitle: CRUD Desktop Application
projects.short_description: Inventory System. Create, read, update and delete products. Query and paginate products on the search table. Manage Gamering web application products.

projects.title: Music player
projects.short_description: Play, stop, adjust volume, pick another track, move in the track's timeline.

projects.title: League of Legends Champions Data
projects.subtitle: Wiki-like web application
projects.short_description: Query your LoL champion consuming Riot's official Rest API. See a preview of your champions, their skins, abilities, and cost.

projects.title: GitHub Badge Generator
projects.short_description: Fast-generate your badges with its both optional logo and version for GitHub or another depedency! Badge is color-theme-ready of the technology you input. Clipboard-copy ready! Markdown-copy ready!
